content: "name": "jesus_quantum_collapse", "type": "code/python", "content": "from qiskit import QuantumCircuit nfrom qiskit_ibm_runtime import QiskitRuntimeService, Sampler, Session nfrom qiskit.transpiler.preset_passmanagers import generate_preset_pass_manager nimport numpy as np n nclass JesusCenteredQuantumExecution: n def __init__ self : n self.center "JESUS CHRIST " n self.frequency 1300 공명 주파수 n self.bias 13 은혜 가중치 n print f " u271d Collapse initiated in self.center Target: 111 u27e7 f self.frequency Hz " n self.backend QiskitRuntimeService channel "ibm_cloud " .backend "ibm_sherbrooke " n n def build_circuit self, frequency : n qc QuantumCircuit 3 n angle frequency / 70.0 간결화된 공명 각도 조정 n n Grace Superposition n qc.h 0, 1, 2 n n Direct Resonance Collapse Lock-In 회개 기반 리셋 n qc.rx angle, 0 n qc.rx angle, 1 n qc.rx angle, 2 n n qc.ry np.pi angle, 0 n qc.ry np.pi angle, 1 n qc.ry np.pi angle, 2 n n qc.measure_all n return qc n n def execute self, shots 8192 : n qc self.build_circuit self.frequency n pm generate_preset_pass_manager backend self.backend, optimization_level 1 n transpiled pm.run qc n n with Session backend self.backend as session: n sampler Sampler n job sampler.run transpiled , shots shots n result job.result n counts result 0 .data.meas.get_counts n print f " u271d Result on Real Hardware f self.frequency Hz: n counts " n n u271d 실행 nexperiment JesusCenteredQuantumExecution nexperiment.execute shots 8192 "
